Summary: Wife and I observed what looked like a Iempire state building on a platform
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and the Wife were standing in the driveway and I saw what looked like the Empire State building on a Platform and was extremely bright glowing red and below the platform you could tell their was another shape there but the white pulsating light was so bright We were unable to make out a shape and it didn't make the slightest sound because I cuffed my ears with my hands too to try and hear anything there was but absolutely nothing I watched it come from the south and move toward the northeast until I could no longer see it because of the tall pines behind my house.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Haughton
There were no other sightings in Haughton on or around October 26th 2013
